Keywords: Cosmic , Herald , Nova Corps
Real Name: Pyreus Kril
Special Powers
COSMIC HEAT BEYOND COMPARE: Energy Explosion, Poison. When Firelord uses Energy Explosion, after resolutions deal X damage to each hit character, where X is the number of other opposing characters adjacent to that character.

February 19, 2021
Goop
Super energy explosion. Nothing really changes though, EE will wreck some teams and be worthless against others. He's situational and for a piece like that, 150 is pretty overcosted.
August 2, 2020
superbill7
8 range with 3 bolts....just sayin' Forces your opponent to keep his forces separated. No close combat bonuses.
August 2, 2020
superbill7
Treat the energy explosion as normal. Then after resolution, the hit character is dealt damage equal to the other characters adjacent. EACH character that took splash damage will take this damage after the initial resolution. I had one game last night that eliminated half of the opposing team (low point figs) in one shot. It is awesome for swarm elimination.
August 2, 2020
guyncognito
Does this mean there are two splash effects? His attack power says after actions resolve?
